fields.title: The Great Gatsby
fields.small_description: A classic novel about the Roaring Twenties
fields.description: The Great Gatsby is a novel by American author F. Scott Fitzgerald that tells the story of the rise and fall of the wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.small_description: A powerful novel about racial injustice in the South
fields.description: To Kill a Mockingbird is a novel by American author Harper Lee that tells the story of Scout Finch, a young girl growing up in the South during the Great Depression, and her experiences with racial injustice.

fields.title: Pride and Prejudice
fields.small_description: A timeless novel about love and social status
fields.description: Pride and Prejudice is a novel by English author Jane Austen that tells the story of Elizabeth Bennet, a young woman in Georgian England, and her romantic relationships with several suitors, including Mr. Darcy.

fields.title: The Catcher in the Rye
fields.small_description: A coming-of-age novel about teenage alienation
fields.description: The Catcher in the Rye is a novel by American author J.D. Salinger that tells the story of Holden Caulfield, a teenage boy who is expelled from his prep school and wanders around New York City, struggling with depression and feelings of alienation.

fields.title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
fields.small_description: A magical realist novel about seven generations of a Colombian family
fields.description: One Hundred Years of Solitude is a novel by Colombian author Gabriel García Márquez that tells the story of the Buendía family, from the founding of their town Macondo to the rise and fall of their family dynasty.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings
fields.small_description: A fantasy epic about a hobbit's journey to destroy the One Ring
fields.description: The Lord of the Rings is a novel by English author J.R.R. Tolkien that tells the story of hobbit Frodo Baggins and his quest to destroy the One Ring, a powerful artifact created by the Dark Lord Sauron.

fields.title: The Diary of a Young Girl
fields.small_description: A personal diary of a Jewish girl during the Holocaust
fields.description: The Diary of a Young Girl is a diary written by Anne Frank, a young Jewish girl, while she was in hiding from the Nazis during the Holocaust. The diary covers her life from 1942 to 1944 and provides a unique perspective on the events of the time.

fields.title: Moby-Dick
fields.small_description: An epic novel about the search for a white whale
fields.description: Moby-Dick is a novel by American author Herman Melville that tells the story of Ishmael, a sailor on the whaleship Pequod, and his journey to track down the white whale Moby-Dick. The novel is considered a classic of American literature and is known for its exploration of themes such as obsession, revenge, and the nature of evil.

fields.title: War and Peace
fields.small_description: A historical novel about the Napoleonic Wars
fields.description: War and Peace is a novel by Russian author Leo Tolstoy that tells the story of the lives of five aristocratic families in Russia during the Napoleonic Wars and the impact of the war on their lives.
